alert.note: Alert for Northwest Pocahontas; Northwest Randolph; Southeast Pocahontas; Southeast Randolph (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 22 at 3:06AM EST until December 24 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Northwest Pocahontas, Southeast Pocahontas, Northwest Randolph and Southeast Randolph Counties. * WHEN...From late tonight through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Northwest Pocahontas; Northwest Randolph; Southeast Pocahontas; Southeast Randolph
